DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the clinicians assessment of the use of an oro-nasal mask during non-invasive ventilation (non-intubated) with a feasibility study.
DOC.brief_title: A Feasibility Study Evaluating the Use of a Non-invasive Ventilation Mask
DOC.criteria: patient requiring noninvasive ventilation in an intensive care unit patient not stable for noninvasive ventilation patient with unprotected airway excessive secretions patient with facial surgery agitated patient
